ai-tha-ap318:1.2_0: the world is attached to the world,
ai-tha-ap318:1.3_0: Like a forest grove in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap318:2.1_0: When they came out through his breast,
ai-tha-ap318:2.2_0: I’ve seen the instructions of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap318:2.3_0: Arranging my robe over one shoulder
ai-tha-ap318:2.4_0: peaceful, to the world and the next.
ai-tha-ap318:4.4_0: the world doesn’t stay close to the world.’
ai-tha-ap318:6.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap318:6.2_0: the finest of things that seem.
ai-tha-ap318:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap318:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap318:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsi.
ai-tha-ap318:10.1_0: took a seat of the senior monks and a sixth part of the senior monks.
